details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.5.3 Annotation dictionaries - Flags
details.description: An annotation dictionary shall contain the F key. The F key’s Print flag bit shall be set to 1 and its Hidden, Invisible and NoView flag bits shall be set to 0

rule.description: An annotation dictionary shall contain the F key. The F key’s Print flag bit shall be set to 1 and its Hidden, Invisible and NoView flag bits shall be set to 0

error.message: Annotation flags are either missing or have forbidden values
